newsitem.title: UK: UK money market forecasts 900 mln stg shortage.
newsitem.headline: UK money market forecasts 900 mln stg shortage.

text.p: The average of forecasts by UK money market brokers of today's market shortage is 900 million stg, according to a Reuter market survey.
The official forecast for the shortage will be released by the Bank of England at between 0945 GMT and 1000 GMT.
Yesterday's final shortage was 1.75 bln stg.
